Weekly News

This page includes current announcements at First Baptist. This is the same information that is found in the weekly bulletin.

Sunday Bible Study

  • Early Sunday School: Sundays, 9:15 AM (Intergenerational Class)
  • Late Sunday School: Sundays, 10:15 AM (Bykota) & 10:45 AM (Two by Two, Friendship, and an Intergenerational Class)

Missional Communities

Missional Communities at First Baptist Muncie began at the beginning of 2013. The ministry runs from February-May (taking a two-month break in the summer) and from August-November (taking a two-month break in the winter). This month, we begin our winter break. Life group leaders will meet during this time to evaluate and discuss the Spring term plans. Please keep this team in your prayers as they work through December and January to prayerfully consider God’s leading for 2014. If you have not been a part of the Missional Community, let me encourage you to consider being involved in 2014. Missional Communities are for anyone and all ages in the church. If you would be interested in being a part of a group in the Spring, please let Wade know.

Music Rehearsals

Choir and Handbell rehearsals will resume after the holidays on Wednesday, January 8. The Band will continue to rehearse on Sunday mornings at 9:30 AM and once a month during the week.

Children’s Church

Children’s Church is during the Late Worship Gathering. Children’s Church is for children in kindergarten through 2nd grade. The children are dismissed before the sermon to the basement classroom for their worship time.

Camp Barnabas Sign Up

The teens are going to be serving at Camp Barnabas July 5-12. If you are interested in going, you need to sign up by January 1. The forms are available at .

Helping Families in Need

If you would be willing to make a financial contribution to families within the church for the Christmas season, please contact Gayle Songer 744-0991 or Barb Eidson 744-0161. Thank you for any help you can offer.

Christmas Eve Service

The candlelight Christmas Eve service at First Baptist Church Muncie is a highlight of the Christmas season. We will gather at 7:00 PM on Christmas Eve to kick off Christmas celebrations in a beautifully decorated sanctuary. As we light the Christmas eve candle, we remember the reason for our celebration. The story of Christmas (Luke 2:1-20) is placed in the context of Christ’s sacrifice for us. There is no more appropriate way to begin Christmas than by receiving the most precious gift, His body broken for us and His blood shed for us.

Helping Those in Need

If you are approached by someone asking for money on Sunday mornings, please direct them to Duane Davis (pictured at right) or a member of the diaconate. Please do not give them cash. The diaconate will assess the need and find a way to best serve them.

Tithes and Offerings

From January through November, our income was 87% of expenses. We hope that everyone will prayerfully consider your tithes and offerings as an act of worship.

Financial Reports

Financial Reports and CCT Meeting Summaries are available in the church office on the receptionist's desk.

Visitor and Bulletin Information

If you would like to place an announcement in the church bulletin please email it to . If you have an article for the February newsletter, please email it to by Sunday, January 19.

Church Office Closed

The church office will be closed from Monday, December 23 until Friday, January 3. If you have an emergency, please call Wade (765) 405-0131 or Matt (765) 405-0536. The office will reopen on Monday, January 6, 2014. This will give our office volunteers a chance to enjoy the holidays.

Open Door Food Distribution

On Wednesday, January 8, Open Door Ministries will be passing out food to needy families from 7:30-9:30 AM. If you know of someone who could use help with food, please let Duane Davis know. If you have a group (SS Class, Mission Circle, or Life Group) that would like to help distribute food, please contact Matt Headley.
